nodes.text: Spinner-webs were a type of substance. In 87 BBY, Jedi Initiates Sifo-Dyas and Dooku encountered spinner-webs when breaking into the Bogan Collection, a secret vault of dark side artifacts located in the Jedi Archives of the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant.
Spinner-webs appeared in a flashback in Dooku: Jedi Lost, a 2019 audio drama written by Cavan Scott.
